title: Creative and Application Developer on the Gold Coast.
description: With over 6 years experience on the Gold Coast and Brisbane, Marais Rossouw offers skills in everything JavaScript, SCSS, Elm, React, Angular, and more.

quote.text: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
